review: Crossing Khardung La was unreal. Pangong Lake looked surreal in the morning light and the guides handled altitude issues very professionally.
Nubra Valley was the highlight for me. The itinerary was intense but well managed. Definitely not for beginners though.
Challenging expedition but totally worth it. Proper acclimatization days made the experience safe and enjoyable.
Baga Beach and Fort Aguada were amazing. The water sports were well organized and safe.
Great mix of relaxation and nightlife. Dudhsagar waterfall trip was slightly rushed but still fun.
Perfect short coastal escape. The local food recommendations were excellent.
Seeing the Taj Mahal at sunrise was unforgettable. The Delhi heritage walk was very informative.
Loved the mix of Delhi, Mumbai and Bengaluru. Travel days were a bit hectic but manageable.
Gateway of India and Bangalore Palace were highlights. Well coordinated city tour.
Amber Fort and Mehrangarh Fort were breathtaking. Camel safari at Sam Sand Dunes was a unique experience.
Udaipur’s City Palace was beautiful. The desert camp night was memorable.
Well planned heritage tour. Good balance between sightseeing and relaxation.
Rafting in Rishikesh was thrilling. Hampta Pass trek was physically demanding but rewarding.
Paragliding in Bir Billing was the highlight. Not for beginners but very well organized.
True adventure package. Safety standards were maintained throughout.
Sula Vineyards tour was elegant and relaxing. The wine tasting session was well curated.
Perfect weekend getaway. Luxury stay experience was top notch.
York Winery visit was peaceful and scenic. Highly recommended for couples.
The Milky Way view from Hanle Observatory was breathtaking. Best stargazing experience I’ve had.
Spiti Valley night camp was magical. Extremely peaceful environment.
Rann of Kutch under the night sky was surreal. Great for astrophotography lovers.
Gulmarg snowfall experience was magical. Gondola ride offered stunning Himalayan views.
Perfect winter vacation. Skiing sessions were beginner friendly.
Snow landscapes were stunning. Very well organized short getaway.
